timeline.bodyText: Perhaps for increased readability this should be (1000L * (long) messageSyncInterval). Even better would be to use TimeUnit for this conversion.
timeline.author: pivotal-jbarrett

replies.bodyText: TimeUnit at the moment has performance issues which were fixed as a part of JDK9 [https://bugs.java.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=8152083]
replies.author: nabarunnag
